title: [BUG] Xamarin.Forms Cannot encode SKImage as GIF
body:
**Description**

When attempting to encode an SKImage as a GIF, it returns a null SKData value

Setting SKEncodedImageFormat to Png works as expected

**Code**

SKImage.FromBitmap(bitmap).Encode(SKEncodedImageFormat.Gif, 100)

**Expected Behavior**

I should get back an SKData object that encapsulates a GIF encoded image

**Actual Behavior**

I get back a null value

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue: 1.68.1.1
- Last known good version: Unknown
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2019
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - iOS:  13.2
  - Xamarin.Forms: 4.4.0.991537
- Target Devices:  
  - iPhone 6 (iOS 12)
